snippet: The "Law & Order" franchise began in 1990, ultimately leading to four different versions. The last one standing, "S.V.U.," was just renewed for its 14th season.
abstract: The "Law & Order" franchise began in 1990, ultimately leading to four different versions. The last one standing, "S.V.U.," was just renewed for its 14th season.

headline.main: Sun Rises, and There Will Be a 'Law & Order' on NBC
